ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): if(widget.ProviderWidget == None) : return
import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Comercial import CMOrdemVendaEntrega
handleItem = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.Handle
if handleItem == 0: return
podeCrud = CMOrdemVendaEntrega.EmElaboracao(handleItem)
if (not podeCrud): widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False
